2018-01-31.headline: CEO Paul Raines Resigns Due To Medical Issues
2018-01-31.description: Mr. Raines' previously successful battle with cancer has had a recurrence requiring immediate medical treatment.

2018-02-06.headline: New CEO Michael K. Mauler Appointed
2018-02-06.description: Mr. Mauler, 56, has been with the Company for more than 16 years. He previously served as Executive VP and President of International, which consists of nearly 2,000 retail stores operating under the GameStop, EB Games, Micromania and Zing Pop Culture brands

2018-02-14.headline: Melvin Capital Files 13F Revealing 10,016 $GME Put Contracts
2018-02-14.description: Reporting up until 12/31/2017. The 10,016 put contracts were worth ~$18M

2018-02-21.headline: GME Quarterly Dividend
2018-02-21.description: The Board declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.38 per common share payable on March 20, 2018 to shareholders of record as of the close of business on March 5, 2018

2018-03-04.headline: Former GameStop CEO Paul Rains Passes Away
2018-03-04.description: After having a brain tumor removed in 2014 with good prognosis, he had a recurrence which ultimately took his life.

2018-03-28.headline: GameStop Reports Q2 2018 Results
2018-03-28.description: GameStop annual income down by $300m due to fourth quarter "asset impairment." Sales up 7.2 per cent to $9.2B with net income of $34.7m

2018-05-11.headline: CEO Michael Mauler Resigns
2018-05-11.description: The sudden and immediate replacement of the 3mo old CEO without explanation was a sign of turmoil and instability within the company. Mr. Mauler did not take any severance package or separation benefits.

2018-05-11.headline: New Interim CEO Daniel A. DeMatteo Appointed
2018-05-11.description: Mr. DeMatteo, one of the company's co-founders, will continue to serve as executive chairman and director. In the past, Mr. DeMatteo has served as the company's CEO and in a variety of board and executive roles since November 1996

2018-05-15.headline: Melvin Capital Files 13F Revealing 11,731 $GME Put Contracts
2018-05-15.description: Reporting up until 03/31/2018. The 11,731 put contracts were worth ~$14.8M

2018-05-30.headline: PayPal Study Names GameStop Top Physical Retailer
2018-05-30.description: Steam is a popular storefront among Millennials globally (31%), the study found, while 45% of U.S. respondents picked GameStop as their favorite. Physical, established retailers are still revered by a significant amount of people despite the growth of digital gaming, Paypal said. This indicates that gamers still enjoy physical copies of their games in addition to newer download options.

2018-05-31.headline: GameStop Reports Q1 2018 Earnings
2018-05-31.description: GameStop's total global sales decreased 5.5% overall to $1.93B. This is despite the results of a recent PayPal poll, in which 45% of U.S. respondents named GameStop as their favorite retailer for purchasing video games.

2018-05-31.headline: New Interim CEO Shane Kim Appointed
2018-05-31.description: Kim will be the company's fourth CEO since the late J. Paul Raines left the position in November 2017, after overseeing the retailer for eight years. Kim was general manager of Microsoft Game Studios and corporate vice president for Microsoft's Interactive Entertainment Business before leaving the company in 2010. Since 2011, Kim has been a member of GameStop's board of directors.

2018-06-18.headline: GameStop Looking To Be Acquired
2018-06-18.description:
GameStop was in "exploratory discussions" with third parties regarding a potential deal. GameStop had struggled with leadership, while its core business has faced declining sales for the past several years as more people download games directly to consoles, computers and mobile devices.
In May, GameStop named Shane Kim, a member of its board since 2011 and a former exec at Microsoft, as interim chief executive. Former CEO Michael Mauler left the post in May after only three months. Days after naming Mr. Mauler as CEO in February, the company fired its COO and its executive VP of strategic business and brand development.

2018-08-14.headline: Melvin Capital Files 13F Revealing 13,281 $GME Put Contracts
2018-08-14.description: Reporting up until 06/30/2018. The 13,281 put contracts were worth ~$19.35M

2018-08-16.headline: New BOD member Carrie Teffner Appointed
2018-08-16.description: Carrie brings 30 years of financial leadership and experience and will join the audit committee. Carrie has served as Executive VP and CFO of Crocs since 2015. Prior to joining Crocs, she served as Executive VP and CFO at PetSmart and, before that, at Weber-Stephen Products. Prior to those roles, she served as Senior VP and CFO of Timberland

2018-11-14.headline: Melvin Capital Files 13F Revealing 13,257 $GME Put Contracts
2018-11-14.description: Reporting up until 09/30/2018. The 13,257 put contracts were worth ~$20.2M

2018-11-21.headline: GameStop Announces Pending Sale of Subsidiary, Spring Mobile
2018-11-21.description: GameStop exiting the mobile phone industry, selling Spring Mobile for $700M
